name: Just Some Parkour
description:
This is my first game made in Unity. I wanted to share it with everyone so they could see were i started.

There are 4 gamemodes:

Normal: Just jump around normaly!

Fog roam: Just like normal, just with fog everywhere!

Low gravity roam: Like normal, but with low gravity!

Find the secret files: You need to find files hidden around the map!

And remember this was my first game made in Unity!
